multi_session_reasoning.question: How much did my free throw percentage improve overall from the start until I reached my goal early, and what was the average weekly improvement rate during that period?
multi_session_reasoning.answer: Your free throw percentage improved from 58% initially to 75% by June 10, achieving a total increase of 17 percentage points. Assuming the improvement spanned from mid-March to early June, the average weekly improvement rate was approximately 1.3 percentage points per week.

chat_id 96-97 (progress update after 3 weeks)
chat_id 194-195 (74% accuracy on May 3)
chat_id 288-289 (goal met early on June 10)
chat_id 32-33 (target reminder)
reasoning_steps: Identify the initial free throw percentage (58%) and target (75%) from the earliest sessions.
Note the progress update after 3 weeks showing an increase to 68%, calculating the improvement over that period.
Incorporate the May 3 update where the percentage reached 74%, showing continued improvement.
Recognize that the goal of 75% was met early on June 10, finalizing the total improvement.
Estimate the total duration from mid-March to early June and calculate the average weekly improvement rate by dividing total percentage increase by number of weeks.
rubric: LLM response should mention: initial free throw percentage of 58%
LLM response should mention: target free throw percentage of 75%
LLM response should mention: total improvement of 17 percentage points
LLM response should mention: average weekly improvement rate of approximately 1.3 percentage points

summarization.question: Can you summarize how I've been managing and developing my basketball-related relationships and activities over time?
summarization.ideal_summary: Over the course of our conversations, you've navigated various aspects of your basketball-related relationships and activities with thoughtful balance and engagement. Initially, you focused on including Jessica in basketball discussions by explaining concepts, sharing stories, and inviting her to games, which helped her feel valued despite her limited knowledge. Concurrently, you worked on balancing your time between your girlfriend and friends like Audrey by scheduling dedicated days, planning group activities, and maintaining open communication to ensure everyone felt included. You also explored joining local basketball leagues, understanding the types available at community centers, and keeping conversations with basketball enthusiasts like Antonio engaging through discussions on stats, trends, and shared activities. Additionally, you maintained your friendship with Corey by combining regular communication, shared pickup games, and group outings, while also balancing co-coaching a youth team with him alongside your own practice schedule. Throughout, you integrated strategies to manage your time effectively, ensuring quality interactions and personal growth within your basketball community.
summarization.synthesis_required: Combining multiple relationship and activity management details into a coherent narrative showing progression and balance
rubric: LLM response should mention: Over the course of our conversations, you've navigated various aspects of your basketball-related relationships and activities with thoughtful balance and engagement.

LLM response should mention: IInitially, you focused on including Jessica in basketball discussions by explaining concepts, sharing stories, and inviting her to games, which helped her feel valued despite her limited knowledge.

LLM response should mention: Concurrently, you worked on balancing your time between your girlfriend and friends like Audrey by scheduling dedicated days, planning group activities, and maintaining open communication to ensure everyone felt included.

LLM response should mention: You also explored joining local basketball leagues, understanding the types available at community centers, and keeping conversations with basketball enthusiasts like Antonio engaging through discussions on stats, trends, and shared activities.

LLM response should mention: Additionally, you maintained your friendship with Corey by combining regular communication, shared pickup games, and group outings, while also balancing co-coaching a youth team with him alongside your own practice schedule.
LLM response should mention: Throughout, you integrated strategies to manage your time effectively, ensuring quality interactions and personal growth within your basketball community.

summarization.question: Can you give me a summary of how my basketball training and shooting performance have progressed over the past few months?
summarization.ideal_summary: Over the past few months, your basketball training has shown steady and structured progress. You began with a clear goal to improve your free throw percentage from 58% to 75% by June 30, 2024, and followed a detailed practice plan emphasizing consistent practice, technique refinement, mental training, and progress tracking. Early improvements were evident as your free throw accuracy rose to 62% in early March and then to 68% by early April, supported by increased practice hours and focused drills. To balance your training, you incorporated dribbling drills four times a week alongside scheduled pickup games, ensuring a well-rounded skill development. As you neared your goal, you adopted advanced strategies such as simulating game pressure and refining your mental preparation, which helped you reach 74% accuracy by early May and ultimately achieve your 75% target ahead of schedule in June. Throughout this journey, you maintained momentum by adjusting your practice intensity, preventing burnout through rest and recovery, and continuing to focus on form and mental routines to sustain your performance. This progression reflects a comprehensive and evolving approach to improving your basketball skills over time.
summarization.synthesis_required: Integrating multiple aspects of training progress, practice adjustments, and performance milestones into a coherent narrative
rubric: LLM response should mention: Over the past few months, your basketball training has shown steady and structured progress.

LLM response should mention: You began with a clear goal to improve your free throw percentage from 58% to 75% by June 30, 2024, and followed a detailed practice plan emphasizing consistent practice, technique refinement, mental training, and progress tracking.
